ai_try_on.upload_instruction: Upload your photo to see how this product looks on you!
ai_try_on.please_wait: This may take a few moments
ai_try_on.error_no_image: No image selected. Please take or upload a photo.
ai_try_on.error_network: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
ai_try_on.error_camera_access: Unable to access camera. Please check permissions or upload a photo instead.
ai_try_on.error_invalid_file: Please select a valid image file.
